text: 12.21 2 Ko 13.2 Pen gos olap nepin ak, pi ak amɨl nɨgɨnɨgayn, tap tɨmel ned gɨpek ak, ñɨn anɨb ak abe gɨnɨgabɨm. Anɨgem, God yɨp gek, yɨp nebeŋ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab. Binɨb nɨbi kuŋay ned tap tɨmel gɨl, mɨñɨl abe anɨgɨpal okok, yad amɨl kɨlop nɨgen chaŋ lɨl yenɨgayn agɨl, yad pɨlɨkebin. Kɨli tap tɨtɨmel gɨl gach sek mɨdɨl, bin si bɨ si dɨl, gos tɨmel nɨŋɨd mapen tɨkjakek gɨl gɨpal. Pen tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal anɨb ak ma kelɨgɨl, monmon yɨbɨl genɨgabal, kɨlop nen chaŋ lɨl yenɨgayn.
